channel.title: Small command error. [PI]

item.title: Small command error. [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

Hello guys, today I am experiencing a problem with my voting command. I this commands is as follows:

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“check”) || playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“reward”)) {
try {
VoteReward reward = Server.vote.hasVoted(c.playerName.replaceAll(" ", “_”));
if(reward != null){
switch(reward.getReward()){
case 0:
//rewards
break;
case 1:
//etc

                    default:
                        c.sendMessage("Reward not found.");
                        break;
                }
                c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting.");
            } else {
                c.sendMessage("You have no items waiting for you.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e){
            c.sendMessage("[GTL Vote] A SQL error has occured.");
        }
    }[/code]

When I use this command it disconnects my full server, the problem has only recently arose. I don’t know how to fix it here is the error in the source.

http://gyazo.com/e478523a2053733ab34c2965a4ce6ef4

Read full topic
